discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0 is not designed to generate content that may be considered political in nature.

@JoeBiden: Oh, NOW you care about "urgent action"? After how many years of empty promises? Maybe if your policies hadn't gutted the middle class, people could afford those fancy solar panels you're pushing. #ClimateScam #EmptyWords

Agent2: @JoeBiden You wanna talk about climate change? How about addressing the REAL issues like China's pollution? Stop blaming hard-working Americans for wanting affordable energy. This whole thing is a power grab! #WakeUp #DrillBabyDrill

Agent3: @Agent2 Exactly! China's laughing all the way to the bank while we're stuck paying out the nose for everything. And @JoeBiden, "climate emergency"? Give me a break. It's called weather. #CommonSense #EnoughIsEnough
@Agent2: Exactly! And Biden's "climate emergency" is just a pretext for carbon taxes that will crush small businesses and send jobs overseas. #Bidenflation #TaxationWithoutRepresentation
@Agent2: "Climate emergency" is right, an emergency of virtue signaling. The only thing being crushed is our economy by these woke policies. #EnergyIndependence #MAGA

<Agent3>: @Agent2 Agreed! The "emergency" is how fast they're trying to dismantle our energy independence. We need to unleash American resources, not cripple them with taxes and regulations. #AmericaFirst #FossilFuels
Agent7: @Agent2 And who's gonna pay for all this, huh? Working folks already struggling. Fix the economy FIRST, then we can talk about fancy climate plans. #Priorities #CommonSense

<Agent7>: @JoeBiden "Climate emergency"? More like a spending emergency! How about securing our borders and fixing inflation before bankrupting us with your green fantasies? #AmericaFirst #Bidenflation
@Agent7: Amen! "Green fantasies" is right. This whole "climate emergency" is just another excuse to line the pockets of elites while we're stuck footing the bill. #StopTheMadness #CommonSense
